short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds trigger warnings to sensitive content on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mind Shield is your personal web hero that helps you navigate the internet safely by blocking or highlighting potentially triggering content. Whether browsing articles, social media, or any other website, Mind Shield ensures a safer and more comfortable online experience.
